title: The Kilgore Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu changes daily depending on ingredient availability. Everything is made from scratch. Breakfast and lunch, full menu until 4pm; coffee, soup, and dessert until 10pm. Offers shelf space for locals to sell their own jarred, pickled, and preserved food. Staff is familiar with dietary preferences and restrictions. Its bakery makes all-vegan breads, and around 1/2 of the desserts are vegan. Menu usually has 1 or2 vegan soups plus kale salads, squash dishes, and veggie sandwiches.
